itemInfo.itemDesc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be Produced at Quint Hill, Bree Tree Ruins, and Old Dandelion. It can be also be obtained by Lumbering Birch Trees.

item.name: Epheria Fishing Rod
item.desc: Epheria fishing rod. It is sturdier than other rods.\nCan be enhanced with Blackstone (Weapon).

item.name: Krea Staff
item.desc: A staff crafted to meet the strict requirements of adventurers.

item.name: Birch Timber Crate
item.desc: A Trade Item containing 10 planks of Birch Timber.

item.name: Ultimate Krea Staff
item.desc:
A Krea staff at its maximum potential.
It has a low chance of being crafted when upgrading a Krea staff.

- Restore Max Durability: Krea Staff of Crimson Flame, Krea Staff of Destruction, Krea Staff of Temptation, Krea Staff

item.name: Krea Staff of Temptation
item.desc:
The energy of Temptation is contained within this Krea Staff.
It can be developed by Refining a common Krea Staff.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Krea Staff of Temptation, Krea Staff

item.name: Krea Staff of Destruction
item.desc:
The energy of Destruction is contained within this Krea Staff.
It can be developed by Refining a common Krea Staff.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Krea Staff of Destruction, Krea Staff

item.name: Krea Staff of Crimson Flame
item.desc:
The energy of Crimson Flame is contained within this Krea Staff.
It can be developed by Refining a common Krea Staff.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Krea Staff of Crimson Flame, Krea Staff

item.name: Ultimate Kalis Longbow
item.desc:
A Kalis Longbow developed to its maximum potential.
There is a small chance this will be developed when Refining a common Kalis Longbow.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Kalis Longbow of Crimson Flame, Kalis Longbow of Destruction, Kalis Longbow of Temptation, Kalis Longbow

item.name: Kalis Longbow of Temptation
item.desc:
The energy of Temptation is contained within this Kalis Longbow.
It can be developed by Refining a common Kalis Longbow.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Kalis Longbow of Temptation, Kalis Longbow

item.name: Kalis Longbow of Destruction
item.desc:
The energy of Destruction is contained within this Kalis Longbow.
It can be developed by Refining a common Kalis Longbow.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Kalis Longbow of Destruction, Kalis Longbow

item.name: Kalis Longbow of Crimson Flame
item.desc:
The energy of Crimson Flame is contained within this Kalis Longbow.
It can be developed by Refining a common Kalis Longbow.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Kalis Longbow of Crimson Flame, Kalis Longbow

item.name: Kalis Longbow
item.desc: A longbow capable of reaching the highest potential of its kind.

item.name: Birch Plywood
item.desc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be also be obtained by Chopping Birch Timber. It requires the knowledge of Chopping: Beginner.

※ Find Lebyos in Heidel and complete the Working the Ash Tree Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the Quest for Beginner Processing knowledge, achieve Gathering Level 14 or higher and visit Ficy in Heidel to complete the corresponding Quest. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Birch Plank
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be also be obtained by Chopping Birch Timber.

item.name: Calpheon Handcrafted Chair
item.desc: A handcrafted chair from Calpheon.\n- 4 Set Effect: Interior Points +200
